reporter_caption.center: ZONA v. NORTH PROVIDENCE BOARD OF CANVASSERS, 110 R.I. 959 (1972)

caption.center: THOMAS W. ZONA v. NORTH PROVIDENCE BOARD OF CANVASSERS.

opinion.posture: Petition for writ of mandamus granted without prejudice. Parties directed to brief and argue the jurisdictional question raised by the apparent conflict in G.L. 1956, §§ 17-24-1 and 17-7-5, as amended.
opinion.attorneys:
Donald R. Lembo, for petitioner.
Robert S. Ciresi, for respondent.
